overview: An animated fantasy about an amazing journey through the most beautiful and interesting places of the Khabarovsk Territory. A small friendly company gets into a car and soon finds themselves in a world of wonders that turn out to be much closer than they could have imagined. This is an unusual look at the sights of the Far Eastern lands, where there is always, at any time of the year, a place for magical beauty and surprises.
title: The Land of Wonders
